column4: displayName
ProMetaS Control Valve Metadata
description
The nominal travel/angle must be entered prior to initialization.
Clear identification of the manufacturer of the valve.
Manufacturer product Id number of the valve delivered with the actuator.
Flow direction of the medium against the valve trim. [eg.: BFTO(Flow to Open), FTC (flow to close), Fluctuating]
Plug with mostly compensated stroking forces.[eg:Without, With(PTE), With (graphite), other]
Type of sealing between seat and plug. [eg: Metal-to-metal, Lapped-in, Soft Seal, Nickel Seal, PTFE, PEEK, UHMWPE, FFKM,UHMWPE(polyethylene), Other]
Additional Information regarding valve.
Diameter of the seat-plug in mm(DIN) (eg 12.7)
Flow coefficient of the valve.
Plug Type of the Valve. [eg Parabolic, V-port, Other]
Valve characteristic flow versus valve travel. [eg Linear, Equal Percentage, Inherent, Other]
Installed Type of valve noise reduction.  (eg None, flow divider ST1,flow divider ST2, flow divider ST3, other)
Additional Information regarding the Seat cone /plug.
Clearly identifies the manufacturer of the actuator.  (eg SAMSON)
Design of the actuator type. (e.g. linear actuator or rotary actuator)
Mode of operation of the actuator. (eg.:Single Acting, Double Acting, Other)
Type of energy supply for the drive. (eg.: Pneumatic(diaphragm), Pneumatic (piston), Hydraulic, Electric, Other)
Effective diaphragm or piston area of the actuator. (in cm2) (eg 12)
Start value of the actuator's spring range. (in bar) (eg: 0.4)
End value of the actuator's spring range. (in bar) (eg: 2)
Fail-safe position in the event of failure of the Actuator haft energy. (z.B: Air-to-Open(ATO), Air-to-close(ATC), Other)
Maximum permissible pressure of the Actuator. (in bar) (eg: 6)
Additional information of Actuator
Clearly identifies the manufacturer of the positioner. (eg: SAMSON)
Manufacturer product Id number of the positioner. (eg: 3730-1)
Clearly identifies the manufacturer of the coupled Devices. (eg: SAMSON)
Manufacturer product Id number of the coupled Devices
identifier
